name: Florere Cleansing Grains - Vegan, pure and highly effective, for face and body, soap-free
description:
Florere Cleansing Grains are a vegan and 100% naturally chemical-free cleanser which will leave the skin unbelievably smooth, moisturized, clean and clear. It's made from naturally occurring, active live healing clay compounds, volcanic ash and finely ground lens esculenta seeds. These are dry grains; when combined with water, the tiny particles form a liquid with extraordinarily powerful absorption properties, making it perfect for cleansing, detoxification and general skin treatment. A little goes a long way...

For all skin types
• 100% natural soap-free, chemical-free formula
• Gentle to delicate skin and environment
• No additives, artificial fragrances, colors, detergents, or sulfates
• Vegan and CCIC-Certified (no animal testing)
• Comes in a convenient 2 oz recyclable glass jar


We would like to share our recommended skincare routine - 3 easy steps to naturally beautiful skin! It’s so simple and inexpensive, too. Your skin will thank you!



Step 1: Pre-cleanse the skin using a small amount of your favorite natural oil. Avocado, sweet almond, or jojoba are our favorites - your skin will tell you which one it likes best! Massage a few drops of the oil onto dry facial and neck skin for 1-2 minutes. Soak a washcloth in warm water, then gently and slowly wipe. Do not scrub!


Step 2: Shake the Florere cleansing grains to evenly distribute all ingredients. In a small bowl, mix 1 part Cleansing Grains with 3 parts water or apple cider vinegar.
Stir until dissolved. Gently apply a thin layer over your face and neck. You can use a small brush or your fingers... just do not scrub! Allow to dry 1 - 5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. If you feel a tightening sensation or the skin appears slightly red, this is normal and should disappear
in a few minutes. (Note: This is a very concentrated product - 1/4 teaspoon of Florere Cleansing Grains should be enough for the face and neck - use sparingly!)


Step 3: Press a tiny bit of Florere Raw Shea Butter Moisturizer onto damp skin. Use under the eyes and lips, too. (Note: Warm the shea in your hands until it liquefies, then apply. The size equivalent to two or three grains of rice should be enough for your entire face and neck.)



Thank you for using natural products. Enjoy!

name: Florere Cream Deodorant - Vegan, Naturally Effective
description:
New for 2013 - larger size! 33% more product!

Florere's natural deodorant cream with essential extracts of organic lavender and clary sage is a unique and gentle formula, yet highly effective and long lasting. It helps keep underarms fresh without aluminum chlorohydrate, parabens or harsh chemicals. The bacterial inhibiting properties of pure essential extracts suspended in our cream base helps reduce odor and perspiration. The triple whipped formula is roughly the consistency of cake frosting, goes on clear and leaves no white residue.



For All Skin Types


• Vegan formula

• Contains no aluminum

• Subtle, natural scent - won't interfere with perfume or cologne

• Long lasting, effective odor protection

• Goes on clear

• Gentle to delicate skin and environment

• CCIC-Certified (no animal testing)



Our simply pure ingredients:

Soothing unrefined Shea (Butyrospermum parkii) butter - Naturally occurring earth mineral deodorizer - sodium bicarbonate. Derived from dried corn kernels - cornstarch - soothes and freshens. Hydrating and protective cocoa (theobrama cacao) butter, vegetable wax (emulsifying nf), coconut (cocos nucifera) oil - moisturizing and restorative. Essential oils of lavender (lavandula augustifolia), (salvia sclarea) clary sage. Tincture of lemon balm, lavender flowers and ecologically wildharvested benzoin (healing, antioxidant, and preservative.); and nothing else.

name: Florere Stick Deodorant - Vegan, Naturally Effective
description:
Florere's natural deodorant stick with essential extracts of organic lavender and clary sage is a patented, unique and gentle formula, yet highly effective and long lasting. It helps keep underarms fresh without propylene glycol, aluminum, parabens, petroleum by-products. The bacterial inhibiting properties of pure essential extracts suspended in our creamy stick base helps reduce odor and perspiration. This is a very long lasting product - one stick should last 3 to 4 months with daily use.

This product is designed to soften upon contact with the skin and your body heat; hold against the skin for a few seconds prior to application.

• Vegan, unisex, patented formula
• Aluminum Free
• Subtle, natural scent - won't interfere with perfume or cologne
• Long lasting, effective protection
• Goes on clear
• Gentle to delicate skin and environment
• CCIC-Certified (no animal testing)

our simply pure ingredients are: cocoa (theobrama cacao) butter, shea (butyrospermum parkii) butter, baking soda (sodium bicarbonate), cornstarch, vegetable wax blend (palm tree copernica cerifera wax and emulsifying nf), coconut (cocos nucifera) oil, essential oils of lavender and clary sage, tincture of lemon balm, lavender flowers and benzoin
